question: ‘NIGHA’, a mobile application to curb election malpractices, is an initiative of which Indian state?
explanation:
Andhra Pradesh government has recently launched a mobile application which aims at curbing the malpractices occurring during the election.
Through the application, any person can file complaints about the corruption or malpractices during the campaign in the upcoming civil polls. With the photos, audio or video files sent by the people, suitable actions will be taken by the government.
